{"step_by_step_thinking": "Vertical root fractures are more likely to occur in roots that have undergone extensive treatment, such as root canal treatment, which involves the removal of dentine and thus weakens the tooth. The shape of the root canal can influence the likelihood of a root fracture. According to Document 13, roots with an elliptically shaped cross section were more prone to vertical root fractures.", "answer_choice": "D. Elliptical"}
